meta_defaults.title: Trojan Jamaica
meta_defaults.description: Trojan Jamaica is the result of a partnership with Zak Starkey and Sharna “Sshh” Liguz. Based in Jamaica, the label will reflect not only the island’s rich musical history, but American soul and blues.
meta_defaults.keywords: Trojan Jamaica, Roots, Reggae, Roots Music, Zak Starkey, Sharna Liguz, Jamaica, Soul, Blues
